structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.catch_line: Transaction Of Business Out Of Court
law.text: Judges of the probate courts may transact business out of court at any time and place, if all parties entitled to notice assent thereto in writing or voluntarily appear; and in such cases their judgments and decrees shall be entered as of such sessions of the court as the convenience of the parties may require.
